value:
I grew up in Ilia, which is frigid and
dreary, so I've never seen anyone
dressed in an outfit this pretty!

Both of my sisters, Thea and Juno,
are dressed up just like me today!
A bridal festival we'll never forget!

When I get married, I'm going to
fly down the aisle on my pegasus!
...Hm? Is that a bad idea?

I know this is just a festival and I'm
not actually getting married, but still...
Tell that to my racing heart!

So, what do you think? Not bad for a
festival costume, huh? I wonder what
Lord Roy and Dieck will say... Haha!

Hi, I'm Shanna. Nice to meet you! As
you can see, I came from the bridal
festival at $Nf's!

Nothing like wearing wedding attire
to make a person feel powerful!
Armor doesn't even compare!

Does this dress make me seem more
ladylike? Well, I guess it's true what
they say: looks can be deceiving!

This dress sure is a pain to move in...
I keep worrying about ripping it!

For me? Oh, I do, I do! ...Just kidding!
You should have seen your face.

I'm Shanna, an Ilian pegasus knight in
training. I'm excited to see what this
bridal festival is all about!

Whew! The bridal festival sure is
something, huh? I'm glad everyone
has enjoyed themselves!$k$pIt seems like the festivities are for
my older sisters more than for me,
frilly white clothes included.$k$pI mean, Juno is already married, and
it's only a matter of time before Thea
follows. My marriage is pretty far off...$k$pBut that just means I have even more
time to become the greatest pegasus
knight in the whole world!$k$pThis festival was a nice preview of
what I can expect, but that doesn't
mean I'll lose sight of my goal.$k$pFrom lancework to pegasus care,
I'm going to get better and better—
just watch, $Nu!
ていっ
そりゃー！
わああっ
What are you...!?
Here comes the bride!
It's MY day!
Promise me happiness?
I...do!
Not...the dress...
Oh, wow!
Whaddaya think of the dress? Good? Too good?!
Wha! Ugh, wow. Moment...ruined.
I'm gonna hang out with my sisters today!
I'd marry someone who "gets" me...lotsa gifts! Hee hee!
There'll be a feast at the festival, right?! Can't wait!
One day Thea might get married too, and... And then I'll be...all alone...
Got your vows ready? Ha-ha. I'm kidding! This dress is just for show.
Bride incoming!
Cold feet?
Wait for meee!
